
```{r}
each_point$run_number = as.factor(each_point$run_number)
```

```{r}

library(RColorBrewer)
my_blue = brewer.pal(n = 9, "Blues")[c(TRUE, FALSE)]
my_blue_nth = my_blue[-1]

each_point_pointplot = dplyr::rename(each_point, `Generation Number` = run_number)

ggplot(data=each_point_pointplot, aes(y=carbon_emitted, x=average_electricity_price, color=`Generation Number`))+geom_point(size=3) + ylab("Relative Carbon Density") + xlab("Average Electricity Price (£/MWh)") + theme_classic() +theme(text = element_text(size=18)) + theme(aspect.ratio = 1, plot.margin=grid::unit(c(0,0,0,0), "mm")) + scale_colour_manual(values=my_blue_nth)

ggsave('/Users/b1017579/Documents/PhD/Projects/10-ELECSIM/run/carbon_tax_optimiser/figures/results/free_points_ga_development.pdf', dpi=1000)

```

```{r}

linear_pointplot = dplyr::rename(linear, `Generation Number` = run_number)
linear_pointplot$`Generation Number` = as.factor(linear_pointplot$`Generation Number`)
my_blue_6 = brewer.pal(n = 9, "Blues")[3:9]

ggplot(data=linear_pointplot, aes(y=carbon_emitted, x=average_electricity_price, color=`Generation Number`))+geom_point(size=3) + ylab("Relative Carbon Density") + xlab("Average Electricity Price (£/MWh)") + theme_classic() +theme(text = element_text(size=18)) + theme(aspect.ratio = 1, plot.margin=grid::unit(c(0,0,0,0), "mm")) + scale_colour_manual(values=my_blue_6)

```
